column2: Another country has offered to be part of the glorious Swiss Empire. Their people have unanimously agreed to immediately assimilated to our culture, should we accept.

You thought you'd get started early and try to take them our early didn't you, you little shit? Well guess what, I thought about that, so have fun with these effects. Don't even try to save and reload to avoid the event, this thing fires so often that you'll be saving at least once a week.
